title: How can I send a ticket?
body:
I'd like to withdraw my membership. 
But I do not know how to send the ticket...

replies.body:
Hey 000e,

If you're looking to delete or disable your account, check out the steps in the [Account Deletion FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ). It includes the link to the Riot Support site, as well as important information regarding the process.

Otherwise, if you have any other questions, feel free to comment here!

You would like to stop playing? 
You can always just uninstall and stop playing the game and unsubscribe from the emails. 

Otherwise you can submit a ticket [HERE.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
